name: FRWB The Legend Of Time Stone
name_original: FRWB The Legend Of Time Stone
description:
Welcome To The World, Full Of Fantasy, And Story
=================]

Welcome to FRWB, for Century Of Years Has Passed From
The Last Breakage Of The Omega Diamond, Water And The
Other Tribe Is Devastated, Sooner, They Prayed For Gods
For Giving Another Chance, And Therefore Given One Last
Diamond, In Return, Elemental Rate, And Weaknesses Has Been
Added, And Said, That One Day... A Man With Blue Will Balance
And Put Back Everything, In Its Placed... And Therefore
You Player... Will Control That Frail Man, Name Chester

Chester Has Core Ability, That Make Him Stable As Leader
His, Entire Life is Been, Subjecting, And Disapproving the Water
Trible's Attitude And Morality, And Even There Power Hungerness...
He's Entire Life is Been A Swordsman, Working In Vain, And Hopeless
For Saving the Once He Should Be Doing, Rather Than Attacking those
Who Dare to Disrespect There King.... As One Truly Said, Water Tribe
Is Infact Communism...
He Has No Ability To Fight... And Only Rely On Other's Hope.. As Long As
Others Are Happy.. He Will Become Happy Too
==================]

FRWB TLOTS, Is A Huge Project... And Require Massive Debugging, But Due 
To Our Team Being Small, We Can't Afford That Much Time.. And Therefore
Made the Gamers The Tester, Now YOU CAN TEST AND DEBUG YOURSELF
Check Out Alot Of Bugs, And Possibly Report It To Us...
But Before We Say Anything About the Bugs.. Please Follow the Guide On Reporting  The Bug Yourself

Bugs Exist In The Old Version is Considered
Bugs Will Be Given its Own Community Page(With Sticky) So You
Can Report It To Us ASAP, 

Bugs Older Than 5 Months Or More is Considered Fixed
This is To Prevent Us/Me From Taking Million Bugs And Only Found
1... And Also To Prevent Overflowing Bugfixes

Bugs Discovered Won't Get Special Treatment, Unless Its Game Breaking
This is to Prevent 1 thing, It Is Yes, Bugs Can Be Fixed ASAP, but...
You See.. The Game Won't Update Always.. Maybe Merely.. But We 
Rely On Time.. And God Damn Coffee... Now.. What Does this Mean?
It Means, If Bugs Found in 1 Version And its Not Game Breaking.. This
Will Be Updated But Won't Be Delivered Right Away, Instead Will Be Updated
Until Next Feature Or Story Is Implemented

Bugs Found In Browser Version is Not Considered
Website Version is Never Been Considered, But Pushed By Our Lovely
Script Writter Raven Casey... Which Is, Yes, We Are In War... I Hate To Add
An Emo And A Happy person In Same Team ;-;... If Bugs Found In Browser.. Its
RPG Maker MZ's Bug(High Chances) Or Its Just Me Mess With Plugins

Now For Last Term:
FRWB TLOTS is Not Suitable For 13 Below, As This Contain Heavy Words And
Some... Bad Bad Bad Bad Stuff... Depicted As Drugs, Gambling Addiction, Slavery And More... Just To Be In Safe Side, GAMERS DISCRETION IS ADVICE, AND ALSO
PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK
===================]

If You Like My (Trash) Content And Project.. Then Cosider Donating To Us In Patreon... This Will Greatly Help Us Alot As FRWB is A Huge Project Now, And I
Require More Help, Than My Average Hand Have, Just Play the Game You'll See How Bad My Art Skills Is ;-;, Thanks For Considering :>

Patreon:
>https://www.patreon.com/ItsMeDevRoland

Patreon Will Get The Following Benefits

Can Request
Cheat Codes
Secrets, And Easter Eggs Sended Every Week
And Possibly More!!!

So Become Supporter Now
